Vitamin K
We all need vitamin K to make 
our blood clot properly so that 
we will not bleed too easily. 
Some newborn babies have 
too little vitamin K. Although 
this is rare, it can cause them 
to bleed dangerously into the 
brain.
The first days with your baby
147
To prevent this, you will be 
offered	one	injection	of	
vitamin K for your baby, as 
this	is	the	most	effective	
way
